text: Andhay per koi harj nahi hai aur na langray per koi harj hai aur na beemar per koi harj haiâ€™ jo koi Allah aur uss kay rasool ki farmabardaari keray ussay Allah aisi jannaton mein dakhil keray ga jiss kay (darkhton) talay nehren jaari hain aur jo min pher ley ussay dard-naak azab (ki saza) dey ga
